|{{HistoryLine||1.4.2|dev=12w34a|[[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (W) JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Wall Gate (NS) JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (E) JE1.png|32px]]<br>[[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (N) JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Wall Gate (EW) JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (S) JE1.png|32px]]<br>Following the introduction of [[wall]]s, fence gates can now be shifted down 3 pixels to accommodate their shape.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.4.4|dev=1.4.3|[[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (W) JE3.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Fence Gate (NS) JE3.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (E) JE3.png|32px]]<br>[[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (N) JE3.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Fence Gate (EW) JE3.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (S) JE3.png|32px]]<br>[[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (W) JE2.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Wall Gate (NS) JE2.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (E) JE2.png|32px]]<br>[[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (N) JE2.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Wall Gate (EW) JE2.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (S) JE2.png|32px]]<br>Fence gates, with the exception of closed east-west connected gates, have had UV changes, seemingly to make planks run across the geometry more realistically.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.8|dev=14w11a|[[File:Oak Fence Gate (N) JE4.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Fence Gate (E) JE4.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Fence Gate (S) JE4.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Fence Gate (W) JE4.png|32px]]<br>[[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (N) JE4.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (E) JE4.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (S) JE4.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (W) JE4.png|32px]]<br>[[File:Oak Wall Gate (N) JE3.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Wall Gate (E) JE3.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Wall Gate (S) JE3.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Wall Gate (W) JE3.png|32px]]<br>[[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (N) JE3.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (E) JE3.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (S) JE3.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Wall Gate (W) JE3.png|32px]]<br>Fence gate models have been updated. In addition, wall gates now have the wood texture also shift to accommodate their model.
|{{InvSprite|Oak Fence Gate}} The texture of the fence gate [[inventory]] icon has been changed. The inventory icon now shows the two holes.
|Fence gates which are closed but receiving redstone power appear open, but are still solid.}}
|{{HistoryLine|||dev=14w17a|[[File:Oak Fence Gate (N) JE5.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Fence Gate (E) JE5.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Fence Gate (S) JE5.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Fence Gate (W) JE5.png|32px]]<br>[[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (N) JE5.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (E) JE5.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (S) JE5.png|32px]] [[File:Open Oak Fence Gate (W) JE5.png|32px]]<br>The UVs of non-wall gates have changed once more, excluding those facing south and closed. |{{HistoryLine|||dev=14w28b|Powered closed fence gates now appear closed.<ref>{{bug|MC-53277}}</ref>}}
|{{HistoryLine|||dev=14w32b|[[File:Birch Fence Gate JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Spruce Fence Gate JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Jungle Fence Gate JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Acacia Fence Gate JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Dark Oak Fence Gate JE1.png|32px]] Added birch, spruce, jungle, acacia, and dark oak fence gates.
